pullrequest.title: update shim controller to do pid servo control

content.raw:
Launching all versions of atlas, altas_sandia_hands or atlas_irobot_hands launch files return an stand up robot, which I assume that is the expected behaviour.

In the other hand, atlas_v3 launch versions fall during the start up. Keyboard teleop is not making the robot to walk anymore.
content.html:
Launching all versions of atlas, altas_sandia_hands or atlas_irobot_hands launch files return an stand up robot, which I assume that is the expected behaviour.

In the other hand, atlas_v3 launch versions fall during the start up. Keyboard teleop is not making the robot to walk anymore.
